title: Economic Model Design for Smart Gated Communities: Building Self-Sustaining Futures in Lagos
description: Weâ€™re developing a smart gated community in Lagos and need a freelancer to design an economic model that supports a self-sustaining ecosystem. The model should balance real estate, energy, utilities, commerce, and community services to ensure both profitability and long-term resilience. The right partner will help us structure a blueprint that blends financial viability with innovation in sustainable living.
